main event: A UFO was observed by a civilian in Hazleton, Pennsylvania on September 15, 1967, over a duration of 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported to move from west to east near an airfield,The witness described the object as circular, bright, and having flashing lights,Several witnesses were present and shared similar impressions of the sighting,The object seemed to accelerate suddenly and disappear from view,No physical evidence or photographs were captured during the sighting.
sighted object: a circular, bright light with flashing patterns
